Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Draw two people with a line connecting them, which may represent the string telephone.
Include elements like cups or a line between the students, symbolizing the components of a string telephone.
CANNOT: Clearly illustrate the purpose of the line (string) and how it functions as a medium for sound transmission (student doesnâ€™t grasp the concept of sound traveling through the string).
Label the drawing accurately to show how sound travels through the string (lacks understanding of sound transmission).
Show any interaction or communication between the two students using the string telephone (may not understand that sound travels and conveys messages).
Use the correct materials representation, such as cups and string, effectively (might use unrelated objects or not depict the correct setup).
